Title: Maldives looks to ‘solid friend’ India to help counter terror
Content: Expressing its “vulnerability,” Maldives has sought India’s assistance in key area of counter- terrorism and the chief of its National Counter Terrorism Centre (NCTC) will travel to India from August
Author: PTI
Description: Expressing its “vulnerability,” Maldives has sought India’s assistance in key area of counter- terrorism and the chief of its National Counter Terrorism Centre (NCTC) will travel to India from August
